title: [build] pass nvcc arch flags to gloo
body_html:
pytorch log:

-- Autodetected CUDA architecture(s): 6.1 6.1 
-- Added CUDA NVCC flags for: -gencode;arch=compute_61,code=sm_61

gloo log:

-- CUDA detected: 9.1
-- Added CUDA NVCC flags for: sm_30 sm_35 sm_50 sm_52 sm_60 sm_61 sm_70

Other built libs I've seen, including libshm, nccl, c10d, use the correct arch flags.
body_text:
pytorch log:
-- Autodetected CUDA architecture(s): 6.1 6.1 
-- Added CUDA NVCC flags for: -gencode;arch=compute_61,code=sm_61

gloo log:
-- CUDA detected: 9.1
-- Added CUDA NVCC flags for: sm_30 sm_35 sm_50 sm_52 sm_60 sm_61 sm_70

Other built libs I've seen, including libshm, nccl, c10d, use the correct arch flags.
body:
pytorch log:
```
-- Autodetected CUDA architecture(s): 6.1 6.1 
-- Added CUDA NVCC flags for: -gencode;arch=compute_61,code=sm_61
```

gloo log:
```
-- CUDA detected: 9.1
-- Added CUDA NVCC flags for: sm_30 sm_35 sm_50 sm_52 sm_60 sm_61 sm_70
```

Other built libs I've seen, including libshm, nccl, c10d, use the correct arch flags.
